verses.verse: אָ֭דָם <WH120> Man יְל֣וּד <WH3205> [that is] born אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> of a woman קְצַ֥ר <WH7116> [is] of few יָ֝מִ֗ים <WH3117> days וּֽשְׂבַֽע־ <WH7646> have enough רֹֽגֶז׃ <WH7267> of trouble

כְּצִ֣יץ <WH6731> like a flower יָ֭צָא <WH3318> He cometh forth וַיִּמָּ֑ל <WH5243> and is cut down וַיִּבְרַ֥ח <WH1272> he fleeth כַּ֝צֵּ֗ל <WH6738> also as a shadow וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יַעֲמֽוֹד׃ <WH5975> and continueth אַף־ <WH637> yet עַל־ <WH5921> upon

זֶ֭ה <WH2088> upon such an one פָּקַ֣חְתָּ <WH6491> And dost thou open עֵינֶ֑ךָ <WH5869> thine eyes וְאֹ֘תִ֤י <WH853> תָבִ֖יא <WH935> and bringest בְמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <WH4941> me into judgment עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with
מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Who can bring טָ֭הוֹר <WH2889> a clean מִטָּמֵ֗א <WH2931> defiled לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one

אִ֥ם <WH518> Seeing חֲרוּצִ֨ים ׀ <WH2782> [are] determined יָמָ֗יו <WH3117> his days מִֽסְפַּר־ <WH4557> the number חֳדָשָׁ֥יו <WH2320> of his months אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> for [חֻקֹּו כ] (חֻקָּ֥יו <WH2706> appointed ק) עָ֝שִׂ֗יתָ <WH6213> [are] with thee thou hast appointed וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <WH5674> that he cannot pass

שְׁעֵ֣ה <WH8159> Turn מֵעָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and וְיֶחְדָּ֑ל <WH2308> from him that he may rest עַד־ <WH5704> Until יִ֝רְצֶ֗ה <WH7521> till he shall accomplish כְּשָׂכִ֥יר <WH7916> as an hireling יוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH3117> his day

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> For there is לָעֵ֗ץ <WH6086> of a tree תִּ֫קְוָ֥ה <WH8615> hope אִֽם־ <WH518> When יִ֭כָּרֵת <WH3772> if it be cut down וְע֣וֹד <WH5750> again יַחֲלִ֑יף <WH2498> that it will sprout again וְ֝יֹֽנַקְתּ֗וֹ <WH3127> and that the tender branch לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not תֶחְדָּֽל׃ <WH2308> thereof will not cease

אִם־ <WH518> Though יַזְקִ֣ין <WH2204> thereof wax old בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the earth שָׁרְשׁ֑וֹ <WH8328> Though the root וּ֝בֶעָפָ֗ר <WH6083> in the ground יָמ֥וּת <WH4191> thereof die גִּזְעֽוֹ׃ <WH1503> and the stock

מֵרֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> [Yet] through the scent מַ֣יִם <WH4325> of water יַפְרִ֑חַ <WH6524> it will bud וְעָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> and bring forth קָצִ֣יר <WH7105> boughs כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> like נָֽטַע׃ <WH5194> like a plant
וְגֶ֣בֶר <WH1397> But man יָ֭מוּת <WH4191> dieth וַֽיֶּחֱלָ֑שׁ <WH2522> and wasteth away וַיִּגְוַ֖ע <WH1478> giveth up the ghost אָדָ֣ם <WH120> yea man וְאַיּֽוֹ׃ <WH346> where
אָֽזְלוּ־ <WH235> fail מַ֭יִם <WH4325> [As] the waters מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from יָ֑ם <WH3220> from the sea וְ֝נָהָ֗ר <WH5104> and the flood יֶחֱרַ֥ב <WH2717> decayeth וְיָבֵֽשׁ׃ <WH3001> and drieth up

וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> So man שָׁכַ֗ב <WH7901> lieth down וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> nor יָ֫ק֥וּם <WH6965> and riseth עַד־ <WH5704> Until בִּלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> [be] no more שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> not till the heavens לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יָקִ֑יצוּ <WH6974> they shall not awake וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יֵ֝עֹ֗רוּ <WH5782> nor be raised out מִשְּׁנָתָֽם׃ <WH8142> of their sleep

מִ֤י <WH4310> O יִתֵּ֨ן ׀ <WH5414> O that בִּשְׁא֬וֹל <WH7585> me in the grave תַּצְפִּנֵ֗נִי <WH6845> thou wouldest hide תַּ֭סְתִּירֵנִי <WH5641> that thou wouldest keep me secret עַד־ <WH5704> until שׁ֣וּב <WH7725> be past אַפֶּ֑ךָ <WH639> until thy wrath תָּ֤שִׁ֥ית <WH7896> that thou wouldest appoint לִ֖י חֹ֣ק <WH2706> me a set time וְתִזְכְּרֵֽנִי׃ <WH2142> and remember

אִם־ <WH518> If יָמ֥וּת <WH4191> die גֶּ֗בֶר <WH1397> If a man הֲיִ֫חְיֶ֥ה <WH2421> shall he live כָּל־ <WH3605> All יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> [again]? all the days צְבָאִ֣י <WH6635> of my appointed time אֲיַחֵ֑ל <WH3176> will I wait עַד־ <WH5704> Until בּ֝֗וֹא <WH935> come חֲלִיפָתִֽי׃ <WH2487> till my change

תִּ֭קְרָא <WH7121> Thou shalt call וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> and I אֶֽעֱנֶ֑ךָּ <WH6030> and I will answer לְֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> to the work יָדֶ֣יךָ <WH3027> of thine hands תִכְסֹֽף׃ <WH3700> thee thou wilt have a desire

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For עַ֭תָּה <WH6258> now צְעָדַ֣י <WH6806> my steps תִּסְפּ֑וֹר <WH5608> For now thou numberest לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תִ֝שְׁמ֗וֹר <WH8104> dost thou not watch עַל־ <WH5921> and חַטָּאתִֽי׃ <WH2403> my sin
חָתֻ֣ם <WH2856> [is] sealed up בִּצְר֣וֹר <WH6872> in a bag פִּשְׁעִ֑י <WH6588> My transgression וַ֝תִּטְפֹּ֗ל <WH2950> and thou sewest up עַל־ <WH5921> up עֲוֹנִֽי׃ <WH5771> mine iniquity

וְ֭אוּלָם <WH199> And surely הַר־ <WH2022> the mountain נוֹפֵ֣ל <WH5307> falling יִבּ֑וֹל <WH5034> cometh to nought וְ֝צ֗וּר <WH6697> and the rock יֶעְתַּ֥ק <WH6275> is removed מִמְּקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> out of his place

אֲבָנִ֤ים ׀ <WH68> the stones שָׁ֥חֲקוּ <WH7833> wear מַ֗יִם <WH4325> The waters תִּשְׁטֹֽף־ <WH7857> thou washest away סְפִיחֶ֥יהָ <WH5599> the things which grow עֲפַר־ <WH6083> [out] of the dust אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְתִקְוַ֖ת <WH8615> the hope אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> of man הֶאֱבַֽדְתָּ׃ <WH6> and thou destroyest

תִּתְקְפֵ֣הוּ <WH8630> Thou prevailest לָ֭נֶצַח <WH5331> for ever וַֽיַּהֲלֹ֑ךְ <WH1980> against him and he passeth מְשַׁנֶּ֥ה <WH8138> thou changest פָ֝נָ֗יו <WH6440> his countenance וַֽתְּשַׁלְּחֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7971> and sendest him away

יִכְבְּד֣וּ <WH3513> come to honour בָ֭נָיו <WH1121> His sons וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> and he knoweth וְ֝יִצְעֲר֗וּ <WH6819> [it] not and they are brought low וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> does not יָבִ֥ין <WH995> but he perceiveth לָֽמוֹ׃

אַךְ־ <WH389> but בְּ֭שָׂרוֹ <WH1320> But his flesh עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and יִכְאָ֑ב <WH3510> upon him shall have pain וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> and his soul עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> and he תֶּאֱבָֽל׃ <WH56> within him shall mourn פ
